title: Obtrusion Book 1 The Gathering
description: "Obtrusion" takes you on an epic whirlwind journey into the lives of a diversely unique group of people who band together to uncover secrets that threaten not only their lives, but the very existence of mankind.Are aliens a reality? If so, are they here among us, and why? What do they want? Are they here to destroy us or save us?The secrets will be revealed as you journey into Obtrusion on your discovery that there is more truth to fiction in the multitude of 'conspiracy theories' you've heard throughout the years.
author: Anastacia Moore
